languages.text: "Ах, это..." {n}Кассия осторожно протягивает сборник произведений кадианского флотоводца и поэта Аэлия Квинта.{/n} "Я приметила занимательный экземпляр на полках библиотеки — все рассказы в сей книге изложены методом стихосложения. Это так... красиво и удивительно!"

traits.locale_text: "Ах, это..." {n}Кассия осторожно протягивает из-за спины сборник произведений кадианского флотоводца и поэта Аэлия Квинта.{/n} "Я приметила занимательный экземпляр на полках библиотеки — все рассказы в сей книге изложены методом стихосложения. Это так... красиво и удивительно!"

languages.text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"
languages.original_text: "Ах, это..." {n}Кассия осторожно протягивает сборник произведений кадианского флотоводца и поэта Аэлия Квинта.{/n} "Я приметила занимательный экземпляр на полках библиотеки — все рассказы в сей книге изложены методом стихосложения. Это так... красиво и удивительно!"

I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

"Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

languages.text: "Ach, das ..." {n}Cassia zeigt dir vorsichtig das Buch, bei dem es sich um eine Sammlung von Werken des cadianischen Flottenkommandanten und Dichters Aelius Quent handelt.{/n} "Ich habe diese faszinierende Lektüre in einem der Regale entdeckt, und ich muss sagen, das Buch ist mir ins Auge gesprungen. Alle Kapitel sind in Reimform geschrieben. Ich finde es so ... wunderschön und bezaubernd!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, das ..." {n}Cassia zeigt dir vorsichtig das Buch, bei dem es sich um eine Sammlung von Werken des cadianischen Flottenkommandanten und Dichters Aelius Quent handelt.{/n} "Ich habe diese faszinierende Lektüre in einem der Regale entdeckt, und ich muss sagen, das Buch ist mir ins Auge gesprungen. Alle Kapitel sind in Reimform geschrieben. Ich finde es so ... wunderschön und bezaubernd!"

languages.text: « Oh, ça... » {n}Cassia vous montre prudemment le livre, qui s'avère un recueil d'œuvres du poète et commandant naval cadien Aelius Quent.{/n} « J'ai trouvé cet ouvrage fascinant sur une des étagères, et je dois dire qu'il m'a captivée : chaque chapitre est écrit en vers. C'est tellement... beau et charmant ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, ça... » {n}Cassia vous montre prudemment le livre, qui s'avère un recueil d'œuvres du poète et commandant naval cadien Aelius Quent.{/n} « J'ai trouvé cet ouvrage fascinant sur une des étagères, et je dois dire qu'il m'a captivée : chaque chapitre est écrit en vers. C'est tellement... beau et charmant ! »

languages.text: “噢，这本书啊……”{n}卡西娅小心翼翼地举起那本旧书，那是一本卡迪亚海军指挥官兼诗人埃里厄斯·昆特的作品集。{/n}“我在书架上看到了这本书，就立刻被它吸引住了。里面的每一节都是诗歌，多么优美，多么令人陶醉！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，这本书啊……”{n}卡西娅小心翼翼地举起那本旧书，那是一本卡迪亚海军指挥官兼诗人埃里厄斯·昆特的作品集。{/n}“我在书架上看到了这本书，就立刻被它吸引住了。里面的每一节都是诗歌，多么优美，多么令人陶醉！”

languages.text: 「ああ、これは…」{n}カシアはあなたに慎重に本を見せる。それは、ケイディアの海軍司令官で詩人のアエリウス・クウェントの作品集だった。{/n}「あたくしは1つの棚からこの興味深い本を見つけました。そして目を奪われたと言うほかありません…あらゆる章が、韻文で書かれているのです。これはとても…美しくて魅力的です！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、これは…」{n}カシアはあなたに慎重に本を見せる。それは、ケイディアの海軍司令官で詩人のアエリウス・クウェントの作品集だった。{/n}「あたくしは1つの棚からこの興味深い本を見つけました。そして目を奪われたと言うほかありません…あらゆる章が、韻文で書かれているのです。これはとても…美しくて魅力的です！」

languages.text: «Oh, esto...». {n}Cassia te muestra cuidadosamente el libro, que resulta ser una colección de obras del comandante naval cadiano y poeta Aelius Quent.{/n} «Encontré esta fascinante lectura en una de las estanterías y debo decir que me ha llamado la atención, ya que todos sus capítulos están escritos en verso. ¡Me parece tan bello y cautivador!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, esto...». {n}Cassia te muestra cuidadosamente el libro, que resulta ser una colección de obras del comandante naval cadiano y poeta Aelius Quent.{/n} «Encontré esta fascinante lectura en una de las estanterías y debo decir que me ha llamado la atención, ya que todos sus capítulos están escritos en verso. ¡Me parece tan bello y cautivador!».

languages.original_text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"

languages.text: "Ha, bu mu?.." {n}Cassia, kitabı dikkatlice sana gösteriyor. Cadia donanma komutanı ve şair Aelius Quent'in eserlerinden bir derleme.{/n} "Raflardan birinde bu enteresan çalışmaya rastladım. Başlığını görünce göz atmaktan kendimi alıkoyamadım... Baştan sona manzum. Gayet güzel, okuması keyifli!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, this..." {n}Cassia carefully shows you the book, which turns out to be a collection of works by the Cadian naval commander and poet Aelius Quent.{/n} "I found this fascinating read on one of the shelves, and I must say it has caught my eye — its every chapter is written in verse. I find it so... beautiful and enrapturing!"
